summary:
##  Auto-Tune & Scheduler

- Added **instant game/launcher detection** via WMI watcher (no wait)
- Normalized process names and cleaned watcher lifecycle
- Removed 5-minute polling timer - process-start events only
- Replaced textbox with **Manage processes** modal (add/remove/de-dupe)
- Auto-tune + scheduler now share curated lists with synced commands
- Added persisted store in %LocalAppData% (survives restarts)

---

##  AppX Repair Reliability

- Added retry + process-stop on **0x80073D02 “in use”**
- Applied to all AppX reinstall paths (Store, frameworks, provisioned)
- Added helpers + hints for ShellExperienceHost/StartMenu/Settings
- Shared process-stop helper now reusable across scripts

---

##  Logging & Output

- New `Limit-TidyLength` to cap oversized log payloads
- Strip ANSI earlier + set **NO_COLOR**
- Added `Write-TidyInfo/Warning/Error` (sanitized output)
- Consistent formatting across all automation modules

---

##  Essentials Queue & Time Sync

- Queue **auto-prepends System Restore** before any non-restore task
- Added w32tm **offset verification** with warnings + opt-out flag
- Locale reset now **opt-in** (no forced en-US)

---

##  UI & UX

- Added **collapse/restore hero header** for Startup page
- Persisted ShowStartupHero preference across sessions
- Cleanup page overlays now scrollable + centered for small screens
- Enabled ClearType caching + high-quality scaling in preview phase
